title: (x) Madagascar movie logo and baseline - Lithos, hand drawn {Dav, Stephen}
content:
Can someone please help me identify these fonts from madagascar? If the "madagascar" is a custom font, could you suggest a close replacement.

Thanks so much for all your help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130628041029im_/http:/typophile.com/files/madagascar_4026.jpg)
author: figrsk8r

comments.content:
'Cute And Cuddly Boys,' = 'Lithos'.

Hmm. Yea, I guess 'Madagascar' could be custom / handmade, and it sure is rather ugly. :)

Dav

Madagascar is certainly hand drawn, and not very well. Reminds me a bit of [Brok](http://web.archive.org/web/20130628041029/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=FB.9286.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=madagascar&sampleSize=38).
